page.title: 04A Typical Day at School
page.content: When I get to school I go straight into the playground. At 8.55 a.m. the whistle blows. We all go into our classrooms. First of all we have register. Then we go to the hall for assembly where we sing hymns, hear stories and pray to God. We go back into the classroom again to do maths, English, project and reading. We have three playtimes during the day. Morning play lasts 15 minutes, lunch play is an hour and afternoon play is 10 minutes. On Mondays and Wednesdays we have Physical Education and in the summer term we have swimming in the school swimming pool on Thursdays. When we finish school, we tidy up and put our chairs on our desks. School finishes at 3.20 p.m. There are lots of after school clubs that we can go to. {Simon Budd aged 11
